definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: He backed the bus away so that we could get into the gate.
sentences.chinese: 他将大客车倒走，使我们能进入大门。

sentences.english: We repainted the bodywork of the bus.
sentences.chinese: 我们把大客车的外部重新油漆了一遍。

sentences.english: A bus and two helicopters took terrorists and hostages on their way.
sentences.chinese: 一辆大客车和两架直升机把恐怖分子和人质运走了。

sentences.english: The major multi-car pileup was caused by a charter bus.
sentences.chinese: 这起严重连环车祸是由一辆包租的大客车引起的。

sentences.english: We are anxious for the coach to come for us on time.
sentences.chinese: 我们急切希望大客车准时来接我们。

sentences.english: Under crane's assistance, the bus soars, is moved puts to the road nearby.
sentences.chinese: 在吊车的协助下，大客车腾空而起，被移放到公路旁。

sentences.english: Excursionists packed into a big bus.
sentences.chinese: 远足的旅客们挤在一辆大客车里。

sentences.english: The motor coach started up. The bus was about to leave.
sentences.chinese: 大客车开始启动，就要开走了。

sentences.english: At Birmingham I transferred to another coach.
sentences.chinese: 我在伯明翰换乘另一辆大客车。

sentences.english: A three-axle bus air pressure braking system is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍三轴大客车气压制动系统。

sentences.english: This van should answer our purpose for transporting children to school.
sentences.chinese: 这辆大客车应该能够解决接送孩子们上学的问题。

definition: small model car/mini-car/small horse-cart/barrow/wheelbarrow/type of folk dance
to tailgate/to hit the car in front as a result of tailgating
